tool_description: The API provides you with cocktails ingredients, quantities and instructions on how to make and serve thies cocktails
name: Cocktail
title: Cocktail

api_list.name: Receive the cocktail data
api_list.description:
Receive the requested cocktail data set, consisting of:

- cocktail name
- ingredients
- how to make
- how to serve

**The Api gives you a selection of 5 matches from our cocktail database consisting of over 600 different cocktails.**
